title: Osprey X

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You have 4 Strikes to use at the start of the game.
-At the beginning of every night, all Striked players alive grants you 1 Volt Point. A Striked player dying causes you to lose 1 Volt Point. As you gain Volt Points, you become more powerful.

fields.name: 2 VP:
fields.value:
Basic Attack
3 VP: Roleblock + Redirect Immunity
4 VP: Powerful Attack + Basic Defense
5 VP: Rampage
6 VP: Powerful Defense
7 VP: Lynchproof once per game
8 VP: Unstoppable Attack
10 VP: Take 2 actions per night

desc:
Post 1713
-Redirect all visits on a player to yourself, deal a Basic Attack to all your visitors, and gain a Strike.
-Prepare a 2 Strikes on players. Strikes will activate the following morning.
-Use the factional attack
